content.question: Do you have a Help with Fees reference number?

helpWithFeesAppliedForFees.required: Select yes if you have a help with fees reference number

helpWithFeesReferenceNumber.required: Enter your help with fees reference number
helpWithFeesReferenceNumber.invalid: Enter a valid help with fees reference number, e.g: HWF-A1B-23C
